Innocent Azubike Umezulike OFR (21 Septemba 1953 - 11 June 2018) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa nke jere ozi dịka onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Enugu Steeti ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri na atọ. Ọ ka bụ onye ọka ikpe kachasị nọ ogologo oge na South-Eastern Nigeria, na onye ọka ikpe nke abụọ kachasị nọ ogologo oge na Nigeria.
A mụrụ Innocent Azubike Umezulike na 21 Septemba afọ 1953 na Rivers State, ndịda Nigeria
Vincent Secondary School, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African n'afọ 1971. Ọ gara Mahadum nke Lagos, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na iwu n'afọ 1976
Ọ sonyeere Nigerian Television Authority dịka osote onye ndụmọdụ iwu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. A nabatara ya na Nigerian Bar Association n'afọ 1980.

N'afọ 1983, Umezulike sonyeere ngalaba iwu nke Mahadum nke Ibadan tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, ebe ọ malitere dịka nnukwu onye nkuzi n'afọ 1987 wee bụrụ prọfesọ n'afọ1992. N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1993, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Enugu Steeti, tupu nke ahụ, ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke steeti ahụ; mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ anọ, a họpụtara ya ije ozi na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Gambia. A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Failed Banks Tribunal Zone 6 Nigeria

N'oge ọrụ ya niile, Umezulike jere ozi n'ọkwa dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na nke onwe ya, gụnyere dịka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Attorney General nke Nigeria tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye ọka ikpe Enugu Steeti. O dekwara ma bipụta ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri abụọ na atọ banyere nnyefe, ihe onwunwe ọjọọ, na iwu ala na ihe onwunwe n'oge ọrụ ya niile.
Umezulike nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na London na 11 June 2018. The Hon

Justice Innocent Umezulike Foundation, nke e guzobere mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, nwere nkuzi ncheta na Justice I.A Umezulike Auditorium, Enugu State High Court complex na Septemba 2019, na-eme ncheta mbụ nke ọnwụ ya site na ngosi nke akwụkwọ Hon
Justice Innocent Umezulike: A Chronicle of Leading Judgements Volume 1.
